FRENCHTOWN , NJ - At the regional semi-finals for the New Jersey Solar Sprints youth engineering contest Green Brook 's middle school students won seven prizes and are sending three teams to the state finals in Florham Park on May 28 .
Maggie Silver , the GATE director , said the event is the highlight of the year for the program .
Each team was given basic kits to build their car around , including a solar panel , battery pack and small motor .
The cars were required to meet certain criteria , including that most materials should be recycled and the car had to be able to carry an empty aluminum can .
